TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit SystemFonts extends System.Object
public ref class SystemFonts abstract sealed

Docs.summary: Contains properties that expose the system resources that concern fonts.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property CaptionFontFamily As FontFamily
public: static property System::Windows::Media::FontFamily ^ CaptionFontFamily { System::Windows::Media::FontFamily ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the metric that determines the font family of the caption of the nonclient area of a nonminimized window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Obtain the metric from SPI_GETNONCLIENTMETRICS. See [SystemParametersInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/sysinfo/base/systemparametersinfo.asp). ## XAML Attribute Usage <*object property*="{ SystemFonts.CaptionFontFamily`}`"/>
